definition: to play the role of/to act
to disguise oneself as/to dress up/to play (a role)/to put on (an expression)
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
role-playing game (RPG)
pinyin: jue2 se4 ban4 yan3 you2 xi4

sentences.english: Earthworms play a vital role in food production.
sentences.chinese: 在粮食生产方面，蚯蚓扮演极为重要的作用。

sentences.english: Governance plays an important role in Program Management.
sentences.chinese: 治理在程序管理中扮演重要角色。

sentences.english: What role does it play within our perception of reality?
sentences.chinese: 在我们的现实视角中它又扮演了什么角色？

sentences.english: Sigourney Weaver plays a botanist overseeing the exploration.
sentences.chinese: 维弗扮演一位植物学家，监督这次探险。

sentences.english: He plays the novel's rakish hero.
sentences.chinese: 他扮演小说中放荡的主人公。

sentences.english: She played the role of lin daiyu in a shaoxing adaptation of dream of the red chamber.
sentences.chinese: 她在绍兴折子戏中扮演红楼梦的林黛玉。

sentences.english: The film also stars a boy who plays the son.
sentences.chinese: 短片的主演还包括一位扮演儿子的男孩。

sentences.english: He played the leading part of Othello in the tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 他在悲剧中扮演主角奥赛罗。

sentences.english: I do not personate the stage-play emperor to entrap applause.
sentences.chinese: 我不扮演戏台上的国王骗取掌声。

sentences.english: Hori agreed economics has played a role.
sentences.chinese: Hori认为经济扮演了一定角色。

sentences.english: Lin Jiadong acts a strange pet shop customer in the piece.
sentences.chinese: 林家栋则在片中扮演一个奇怪的宠物店顾客。

sentences.english: However, its role is more that of a super-heavy tank destroyer.
sentences.chinese: 怎么说呢，他时常扮演一个超重型的坦克杀手角色。

sentences.english: The demultiplexor plays a key role in set top box(STB).
sentences.chinese: 解复用器在机顶盒中扮演了一个关键的角色。

sentences.english: He was somewhere between a second father and an older brother to me.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，他扮演着一个介于父亲和兄长之间的角色。

sentences.english: You should practice playing the grieving widow.
sentences.chinese: 你应该练习扮演一名悲痛的寡妇。

sentences.english: That mous actor seemed content to play a minor part in the play.
sentences.chinese: 那位名演员似乎很乐意在剧中扮演一个次要角色。

definition: role/character in a novel/persona/also pr. [jiao3 se4]
to act/to play a part
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act
to appear (in a show etc)/an appearance (on stage etc)
villain (of a drama etc)
(of an actor) to bring (one's character) to life/to act brilliantly
to appear on stage in an amateur capacity/(of a professional) to make a guest appearance/(fig.) to assume a role outside one's usual duties/to substitute for
in the movie
supporting role (in play, film etc)/minor role/to play a secondary role (in business etc)/to play second fiddle
stage costume
(Chinese opera) to play a role outside of one's specialty/(modern) to play a transvestite role/to masquerade as an opponent
to play a leading role/to bear a heavy responsibility
leading role/lead
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
scene (in a movie etc)/one's part in a movie or play/(archaic) actor's payment
to act the leading role (in a movie or a play)/to star/lead actor
